comments.body:
I think you need to specify an [entry point](https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/source/resources/define-metadata.html?highlight=meta.yaml#python-entry-points) here:

https://github.com/codacy/python-codacy-coverage/blob/master/setup.py#L65

Done in line 16:
```
    entry_points:
	    - python-codacy-coverage = codacy:main
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"
  entry_points:
    - python-codacy-coverage = codacy:main
